data.description: Step into the future of home technology with our voice-controlled smart speakers. With a range of up to 5 meters, these intelligent devices become your personal hub, allowing you to effortlessly command and control your connected world. Say hello to a smarter, more convenient lifestyle, where your voice takes center stage in managing your environment.
data.title: Smart Speakers

data.heading: USE CASES
data.title: Voice control smart speakers from 5m

cards.title: Voice control smart speaker from a distance of 5 meters
Barge-in even when playing music at loud volumes
Add voice calling to smart speakers

data.description: In the ever-evolving landscape of smart speakers, we introduce a transformative use case that redefines how we interact with these devices. Our focus is on three key innovations: Long-Distance Voice Control, Barge-In Functionality even when playing music at loud volumes, and the integration of Voice Calling capabilities into smart speakers.

cards.description: Picking the right keywords will only get you so far. We understand how to match the search intent of your target keywords with ad copy, CTAs, and landing pages that turn clicks into ROI.
cards.title: Match search intent at every touchpoint
